title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 231-10.6 - Erc registry
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 231-10.6 - Erc registry

State Regulations
(a) All approved
ERCs that may be used as emission offsets will be entered into a listing of
available ERCs (designated the ERC Registry) maintained by the department after
the department has approved the ERC application in accordance with the
procedures in this Part. In the case of a single source SIP revision, the ERCs
will be entered into the registry after EPA has approved the SIP revision. The
registry may be obtained from the department upon request. (b) ERC transfers. The authorized
representative or a responsible official of the transferor (seller) must submit
a "use of emission reduction credits" form to the department specifying the
terms of the transfer. If the department determines that the proposed ERC
transfer is approvable, the department will note the transfer of ERCs on the
registry. Notes
